message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $135. Would you be interested in taking it at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
